features: Package Content: Our package includes a portable brush set, also known as a "broom and dustpan set," "dustpan and brush set," or "mini dustpan and brush set," designed to provide top-notch cleaning solutions in an efficient and convenient way.
Product Size: Measuring at 19.5cm x 13.3cm x 2.6cm (7.67 x 5.12 x 1 inch) and weighing only 52g for each set, this "small broom and dustpan set" is incredibly portable and easy to use.

Sturdy and Durable Material: Crafted from high-quality, strong, and durable plastic, our brush set ensures long-lasting service and maximum value, whether you're using it as a "whisk broom small" or a "mini dustpan and brush set."

Product Advantages: The mini broom is thoughtfully attached to the dustpan, with convenient holes for easy suspension when not in use. Its compact size makes it perfect for quick cleaning jobs that require minimal space, making it the ideal "broom with dustpan combo set."

Versatile Applications: Our portable brush set is highly versatile, excelling in cleaning dining tables, sofas, and car equipment, while also serving as a valuable tool for "cleaning guinea pigs, rabbits, hedgehogs, hamsters, squirrels, cats, lizards, and other small animals." Whatever the cleaning job, our portable brush set is the perfect solution. perfect solution!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun Toy For Toddler
reviews.reviewText: Our daughter has been obsessed with our broom lately. She's always wanting to sweep the floor, but it's difficult to hand her the broom because she knocks things off the counter because she's too young to understand her surroundings. But this broom and dust pan set is perfect for her! She'll crouch down, tap the floor a few times with the broom, then walk over to the garbage can and tap the dust pan on it a few times, then repeat the process. It is a bit flimsy because of how thin the plastic is, but since it's meant to be used for little things, that shouldn't be a big deal if used for actual cleaning tasks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a handy little (and I do mean little) dustpan that works well. I plan to keep it in my car for small cleanup jobs, but it would be a good solution for a variety of applications, like a counter top, kitchen table, or a desk area.The little broom that comes with it also works well and fits nicely inside the handle. They both have built-in holes for hanging.This is a good dustpan for what it’s designed for: a handy, small pan for small jobs.
